actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 to provide for the equitable distribution of rail service continuation assistance in the Region.

summary.text: Revises the distribution of rail service continuation assistance to States under the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 by removing the provision entitling each State to not less than three percent of the appropriated funds.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 to provide for the equitable distribution of rail service continuation assistance in the Region.
